title: Unfaithful: Explicit Stories of Escape, Adultery and Betrayal
description: It's so wrong...  Wrong to be turned on by stories of cheating wives and husbands, of a boyfriend with a roving eye or a girlfriend who succumbs to temptation.  Wrong to be attracted to an old flame, wrong to be drawn to a colleague or a friend or even a complete stranger.  Something so wrong shouldn't be so horny, but some things are so wrong they just have to be right.  Unfaithful: seven explicit stories of escape and betrayal from some of the hottest erotica writers around, some written specially for this boxed set.  The stories in Unfaithful are: The Road Trip by Tanya Korval Jenny Goes Dogging by Polly J Adams The Cheaters by Saffron Sands Caught with the Maid by Jade K Scott An Adulterous Surprise by Carl East An Irresistible Offer by Angel Wild Sleeping with the Past by Polly J Adams and Ruby Fielding
author: Polly J. Adams
